```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Import the weather data

```{r}
weather_df = 
  read_csv("nynoaadat.csv")


weather_df = 
  read_csv("nynoaadat.csv") |> 
  filter(
    id %in% c("USW00094728", "USW00022534", "USS0023B17S"), 
    date >= "2021-01-01", 
    date <= "2022-12-31"
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    name = case_when(
      id == "USW00094728" ~ "CentralPark_NY",
      id == "USW00022534" ~ "Molokai_HI",
      id == "USS0023B17S" ~ "Waterhole_WA"
    ),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10
  ) |> 
  select(name, id, everything())

```


```{r}
weather_df = 
  read_csv("weather_df.csv") |> 
  filter(
    id %in% c("USW00094728", "USW00022534", "USS0023B17S"), 
    
    date >= "2021-01-01", 
    date <= "2022-12-31"
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    name = case_match(
      id, 
      "USW00094728" ~ "CentralPark_NY", 
      "USW00022534" ~ "Molokai_HI",
      "USS0023B17S" ~ "Waterhole_WA"),
    tmin = tmin,
    tmax = tmax) |>
  select(name, id, date, prcp, tmin, tmax) 
```


Making our first plot.

```{r}
ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
weather_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggp_weather_scatterplot = 
  weather_df |>

```
